item.title: Regex to validate domain name
item.description: Using a regular expression to check if it is a valid domain. function isValidDomain(v) { if (!v) return false; var re = /^(?!:\/\/)([a-zA-Z0-9-]+\.){0,5}[a-zA-Z0-9-][a-zA-Z0-9-]+\.[a-zA-Z]{2,64}?$/gi; return re.test(v); } Usage isValidDomain('example.com') // true isValidDomain('foo.example.com') // true isValidDomain('bar.foo.example.com') // true isValidDomain('exa-mple.co.uk') // true isValidDomain('exa_mple.com') // false isValidDomain('example') // false isValidDomain('ex*mple.com') // false isValidDomain(3434) // false On github at miguelmota/is-valid-domain
